title: Human development: conception to neonate. Reducing risk factors
brief_description: This program looks at the parental behaviour which can reduce the incidences of birth defects and low birth weight. The factors which contribute to to birth defects and the consquences for parents and society are examined. The program concentrates on factors which are preventable, primarily through changes in lifestyle.
